Turns Out, STEM Development is Indeed Child’s Play!

If you are looking for a fun, educational, exciting modeling clay set for kids, you’ve found the right place to make your play! Say goodbye to all those same-old action figures, mind-numbing video games and boring sweaters. Now you can surprise your child with an ultra-fun, ultra-educational play set!

Discover The Creative Kids Air Dry Clay Set For Kids – an innovative air-drying clay kit that will help your child broaden his/her imagination, develop essential skills, and create the most amazing clay sculptures ever!

As parents ourselves, your child’s well-being is our TOP PRIORITY! That’s why our modeling clay is 100% skin-safe, 100% hypoallergenic and 100% non-toxic.

Stunning Decorations Made By Your Little Artist

Keep your toddler entertained, engage and occupied during long road trips, lengthy flights or even on those rainy days during your summer vacations. You can easily take our mess-free air-dry clay kit with you and offer your kid the opportunity to build his/her own souvenirs that will one day make the most heart-warming memories!

Description:
• Make Your Own Unicorn Pillow: The B Me unicorn pillow kits for kids will give your kids the chance to use their imagination for the creation of their one-of-a-kind pillow. 
  • No Sewing Required. This knot pillow is perfect for beginners, no experience is needed! Kids will have an easy and fun time making the pillow and can decorate it with fun and colorful stickers.  
  • Nothing Else Is Needed.  We provide you with all necessary materials to complete the project. You get felt pieces for your pillow, stuffing, decorative stickers, and step-by-step instructions. Get ready for a cozy creation! 
  • Great Gift For Any Occasion: The B Me pillow kit is the ideal gift for birthdays, Christmas, or any other occasion. Surprise your daughter with a stunning unicorn pillow kit and put a smile on her face! 
  • Order Your B. Me Unicorn Pillow Risk-free: Made from kid-friendly materials, our DIY Unicorn Pillow kit is specially designed to help your child spend endless hours of fun without any worries. 

Create a Magical Unicorn Pillow 

We’ve got the perfect activity to keep kids occupied while having a fun time. Kids will love the B Me DIY Unicorn Pillow kit because it offers a great creative outlet, and they’ll get a unique keepsake out of it. They’ll be so proud of what they can create. 

No-mess, No-sew Fun 

Our kit is great for beginners so young kids will have an easy and fun time. Minimal parental guidance is needed, no sewing is required! Just knot the pillow ends together, add your stuffing and decorate to your taste. This unique pillow made entirely by you will add a special touch to your room. Show off your creation by proudly displaying it on your bed or desk.  

The Perfect Sleepover Activity 

Have their friends join in on the fun! Offer this entertaining activity at their next sleepover or playdate. Watch as they create their very own pillow to use and enjoy. Your party can be a smashing hit with the help of the DIY Unicorn Pillow kit by B Me.

Name: B Me Make Your Own Fairy Lantern Night Light
Description:
•  MAKE YOUR OWN MAGICAL FAIRY LANTERNS: Our fairy light kits include all you need to create your fairy lamps. Find in the box 3 fairy jars, 3 custom cut fairy lights, 2 sheets of fairy designs, glue, ribbons and get started!
  • KEEP YOUR LITTLE GIRL ENGAGED & ENTERTAINED: Help your little princess express her artistic talent and develop her imagination by creating her own fairy lamps. Make a rainy afternoon or lazy weekend a bit more colorful!
  • CREATE THE CUTEST BEDROOM NIGHTLIGHTS: Illuminate the kid's room, to inspire them sweet dreams. Hang the soothing LED nightlight on the wall or place it on the bedside table, to add a touch of magic to the room decor.
  • BRIGHTEN THE FAIRY PARTY: Our fairy art project kits will thrill upgrade the fairy birthday party, your living room or bedroom atmosphere or the fairy-themed garden ambiance. Make your home area more inviting!
  • SURPRISE YOUR LITTLE FAIRY: Looking for an original gift for your daughter, granddaughter or pupil? For a thoughtful gift for your DIY enthusiast friend? Our fairy art projects will thrill the lucky recipient!

You Don’t Have To Believe In Fairies In Order To Create The Ultimate Fairy Lanterns!

Once upon a time, there were little glowing fairies looking for a new home. They had traveled the world in search of a kid with a big heart and an even bigger imagination to help them build a home, where they could carry on spreading pixie dust and illuminating their world.

It’s time to set those smartphones, tablets, and video game controllers aside, and dive head-first into a magical world filled with fairies, lights, and pixie dust!

Presenting A Luxurious Fairy Nightlight Lantern Craft Kit, Released by B Me!

Nothing compares to the satisfaction derived from our own handicrafts. And this light-up fairy lantern craft kit is created to fill with pride young and adult crafters. It is easy to use for kids, provides a mess-free assembly and will help the whole family spend quality time together at the weekend or during their summer holidays.

Add A Dash Of Pixie Dust To The Nursery!

Our fun-filled fairy lanterns will look fantastic in your kids’ room. Their inspiring fairy design will create a dreamy atmosphere, while the warm night light will soothe and calm your little angels in the dark. The power-saving feature makes them great for lasting fun, while the one-button operation makes the use super convenient.

Spice Up Your Garden & Kids Room Décor!

Add a romantic touch to your outdoor decoration, to make your garden, porch, patio or yard more inviting for your guests. These deluxe fairy lamps will perfectly complement your fairy décor, hanging graciously on the fence, the trees or standing proud on.

Name: Baby Shark Button Art - Color Match Pegboard For Kids

  • Support Kids Development: This educational toy is perfect to develop kids fine motor skills, creativity, and imagination 
  • What’s Inside: Craft and explore Baby Shark family characters matching 46 colorful buttons and 9 super cool design sheets, storage case included 
  • Great Gift Idea: Surprise your kids with this fun and bright gift perfect for a birthday party or any holiday

Create Some-fin Amazing 

Give kids a craft that will help their overall development while having fun. Kids will improve dexterity and fine motor skills by carefully grasping, inserting and pulling their button art. As visual motor and creativity get developed, it will provide them with opportunities for trying out new ideas and will promote new ways of thinking. Provide them with the perfect creative outlet that will motivate them to exercise their creative thinking.   

Follow along in the instructions for step-by-step directions that make it easy for little kids to create shark masterpieces. They will be able to complete 9 boards using 46 chunky buttons. Create Your Own Fin-Tastic Water Bottle Today!

Name: Baby Shark Stamp Set By Creative Kids – 36 Piece Wooden Stamps Set
Description:
• All-Inclusive Kids Art Set: Introduce your child to the world of visual storytelling through the adventures of baby shark and the family. Our premium set of stamps for kids allows your toddler to stamp, create, and color to begin his own underwater magical experience. 
  • Fin-Tastic Preschool Toys Set: This toddler art supplies set helps your children get familiarized with sea animals, and offers them an artistic way to express themselves, by making fascinating ocean scenes. 
  • Start A Jaw-Some Ocean Adventure Right Away: Our art kit for kids includes 10 stamps for toddlers, 2 ink pads, 6 markers for kids, 1 sticker sheet, 8 white papers, 8 fun scenes - plus 2 picture frames for your kid's artwork. 
  • Spoil Your Little Boy Or Girl: Make your kid's day with this awesome set of wood stamps for kids and offer it as a birthday, Christmas, or holiday gift. Keep kids creatively busy at a birthday party, sleepover, or playdate. 
  • The Safest Art Kit For Children Ages 3 And Up: Our craft sets include nontoxic, washable ink pads and easy to use wooden kids stamps. They’re made to fit perfectly in little hands so kids can easily grasp, ink and stamp! 

Entertain Your Children In Mother Nature’s Biggest Water Playground! 

One of the best ways to introduce your child to imaginative play is through a good set of wooden stamps. Not only are they one of the most affordable toys around, but they can help your toddler develop their already blooming creative instincts and have long hours of creative fun, away from addictive smart screens. 

Introducing The Baby Shark Stamp Set By Creative Kids! 

Every kid loves animals, and if your toddlers are into under-the-sea swimmers, they are sure to find their favorite with our stamp set. Made of wood, the baby shark stamps will last a long time, and with so many to choose from, it is unlikely that any of them will wear out anytime soon. Our stamp kit includes over 36 pieces and comes with a set of coloring markers and a washable ink pad with pink, green, blue, and yellow inks! 

Boost Your Kid’s Cognitive Skills And Self-Confidence! 

Baby shark has captured the hearts and imaginations of little boys and girls all over the world. Now, the magic of the ocean life can be experienced through these decorative wooden stamps, which will help bring to life amazing pictures of sea animals and plants. By stamping, sticking, and drawing, your kid develops their fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, color recognition, patience, perseverance - and improves their social abilities as they play with their friends.

Name: Baby Shark Water Doodle Mat – Magic Doodle Play Mat with Stamps, Stickers & More Ages 2+
Description:
• Creative Toddlers Drawing Mat: Use the included pens, stencils, stickers & more to decorate your water mat 
  • Endless Fun: your reusable Magic doodle mat is made of magic. Watch the ‘ink’ disappear! 
  • Mess-free Activity: only water & imagination are needed to turn mat into masterpiece. 
  • Spoil a Loved One: this writing & painting mat is the perfect gift to keep little ones creatively occupied for hours! 
  • Safe for kids’ use. Your satisfaction is our top priority. This product is non-toxic, kid-friendly & a great artistic outlet 

Put Pen to Mat! 

 Join the Baby Shark family on an exciting journey through hands-on play.  This jam-packed set will let you color, stamp & stencil your own disappearing art. Use the water pens to reveal all the colors on the mat and find hidden objects along the way! This reusable product is great entertainment for kids 2+ and they’ll be mesmerized by the disappearing ‘ink’. Watch as the water evaporates from the mat and leaves you with a blank canvas once again. Getting creative has never been this fun or mess-free! 

Mess-Free Entertainment 

Getting creative has never been this clean before! All that’s needed to create grand art is a little bit of water! Add water to your water pens or stamp pad to get started. Once you’re done playing, watch as the magical ink disappears off the mat so you can use & enjoy again.

Name: Back to School Crayons - 36 Packs of 24 Crayon Sets
Description:
• 36 COUNT CLASSROOM CRAYON CASE – Jumbo Supplies Set Includes 3 Dozen Individual Coloring Crayon Sets for Endless Arts and Crafts & Learning Activities -
  • 24 VIBRANT COLORS PER PACK – Each Box Features a Vast Collection of Bold, Beautiful Shades of the Rainbow Including Blue, Yellow, Green, Red, Pink & More
  • HIGHEST QUALITY ARTIST WAX – Rich, Vivid Color Rolls on Paper Easy, Smooth, Even & Opaque; Perfect for Elementary Aged Kids, Toddlers, Middle School & More
  • SAFE & NON TOXIC FOR SCHOOL – Strong, Durable, Washable Crayons Come Conveniently Sharpened & Ready to Use; Conforms to ASTM D4236 for Safety
  • BUY IN BULK FOR BEST DISCOUNT – Enjoy Maximum Savings & Countless School Supplies Bulk Benefits When Purchasing the Whole Lot; Large, Sturdy Boxes for Neat Storage

Creativity comes in every color of the rainbow!

No classroom is complete without plenty of coloring and drawing supplies. The problem is, a teacher’s funds can only stretch so far.

When buying in bulk on a budget, you’re often met with cheap crayons that crumble and break after one use. If they do last, they leave little to no color on the page, making true masterpieces hard to come by.

For boys and girls to unleash their inner artists, they need high-quality arts and crafts supplies capable of surviving the entire school year. Now, with this massive lot of Bulk Classroom Crayons from Creative Kids, teachers everywhere can encourage greatness without breaking the piggy bank.

The convenient set arrives with 36 individual 24-crayon boxes—just the right amount to accommodate the average classroom.

Little ones color their world with maximum inspiration thanks to our safe, non-toxic crayons’ smooth-gliding action and rich, bold, opaque pigment. From preschool to play dates to party favors and beyond—draw more for your dollar, and add Creative Kids’ Bulk Classroom Crayons to your cart today!

Name: Be Amazing! Toys Interactive Human Body Fully Poseable Anatomy Figure – 14” Tall-Casepack 4

• FULLY EQUIPPED 3D BODY PUZZLE – The Interactive Human Body is a 14" Tall, Fully Articulated and Posable Human Body Model. Mimic the movements of real human anatomy, and see how we move. Young scientists can get a real inside-look!

This realistic model is built as close to the actual human body as possible and will have kids engaged in anatomy like never before, perfect for a future doctor or budding scientist in the home!
  • EVERYTHING YOU KNEE-D IS INCLUDED - Our human body model for kids comes with 60 pieces for you to assemble, take apart, and put back together again! Complete with bones, muscles, and organs, plus an adjustable stand to help your Human Body test out endless poses!
  • LEARNING MADE FUN - Includes colorful, illustrated instruction cards that teach kids all about their body and its functions. They’ll be entertained for hours learning all about their bones, muscles, organs and much more.
  • PLAY AND LEARN IN SAFETY - The Be Amazing! Toys Interactive Human Body is made with care and top-quality materials and is fully safety tested for kids 8 and up. Makes the perfect gift! Page Break

Help Your Kids Explore the Human Body

If you are looking for a way to make biology lessons fun, challenge your kids with anatomy, and ignite curiosity at the same time, then we have got the ideal STEM toy for you. Teach your kids all about the functions of a human body.

Introducing the Interactive Human Body Model for Kids by Be Amazing! Toys!

The Be Amazing! Toys Interactive Human Body is a STEM toy designed to educate children about the human body, its parts, and different functions. Made with top quality materials, our human body is kid-friendly and will offer many fun hours to your young ones along with so much knowledge gained effortlessly through play.

Name: Blippi Water Doodle Mat by Creative Kids – Magic Water Drawing Mat
Description:
• Mess Free Water Drawing Mat: The Creative Kids water drawing mat will allow kids to create superb drawings and enjoy hours of fun with the magic water pen that will reveal hidden pictures.  
  • Ta-da.....It’s Gone! You can reuse your Blippi Water Mat over an over for endless fun. Watch as your images disappear from the mat after a few minutes. The water will evaporate and leave you with a blank canvas once again. It’s magical to watch the images appear and disappear!  
  • Learn The Abcs With Your Friend Blippi: Give your children the chance to learn in the most fun way with the help of their friend Blippi. Help them draw the ABCs while sounding them out.  Try to draw the whole alphabet before it disappears! 
  • Everything You Need In An All-inclusive Kit: Our no mess coloring mat for toddlers comes equipped with 26 pieces to give children various creative options such as Blippi stickers, stencils, stamps and more. 
  • Completely Safe For Kids To Use: Leaving kids around harmful paints is not something any parent wants. Our water mat is completely safe since it works just with clear and pure water

Abracadabra......It’s a Magic Water Mat 

If you’re looking to keep your little ones entertained with a mess-free, educational toy, then we’ve got just the thing for you. Our water mat is great for inspiring creativity and providing a creative outlet. Kids will love the ‘magic’ behind the appearing and disappearing ‘ink’. 

Introducing the Ultimate Coloring Mat for Toddlers by Creative Kids! 

The Creative Kids mess-free doodle mat is the perfect activity for boys and girls. It’s made of non-toxic material, and no paint is required. You can fill the pen with clean water and draw on the magic mat. A few minutes later, the drawings magically disappear, and kids can start drawing all over again. You can also decorate your canvas with our custom Blippi stamps and stickers, they’ll really add an extra special touch to your masterpiece. It’s never-ending fun!  

No mess, No Paints, Everything Is Spick-and-Span 

With the Creative Kids water mat, you won't have to worry about ruining or messing up the floor or the carpets. Give your kids the chance to draw freely without the use of crayons, markers or paints. They’ll be fascinated by the magic pens and stamp set and you’ll love the mess-free fun.

  • ORDER YOUR OWN KIT + ONE FOR YOUR FRIEND: No doubt your friends will start asking questions about your glitter tattoos! Make your best friend's day with an unforgettable birthday, Christmas or holiday gift!

Parents, Help Your Princess Upgrade Her Style With Unique Glitter Tattoos!

If your fashionista loves glitter, temporary tattoos, and DIY craft kits, it’s your lucky day, Surprise your fashion-icon with an awesome glitter tattoo kit for girls who want to stand out!

Introducing The Body Bling Boutique Glitter Tattoos Set, by Creative Kids!

Shine, glamour, charm… no woman can resist the temptation of looking prettier – and this starts at a very early age. If you want to help your girl underline her trendy looks, a glitter tattoo set is an answer! They will add sparkle to her style while keeping her creative!

Let Your Girls Happily Play With A Refreshing Activity Set!

Give your girls all they need to create their own body tattoos! Watch them put their energy into picking cute tattoo patterns from the box and follow the simple instructions to complete their beautiful crafts! Let them immerse in a relaxing, calming, and rewarding activity that will teach them how to make the most of color combinations.

Sprinkle Magic Dust To The Party Or Playdate!

Open the box on your girl’s birthday party and hand the tattoo sheets, glitter pots, brushes, glue, stencils, and body markers to your daughter’s guests, to set the special event on fire! Made of safe materials, hypoallergenic, and easy to apply, the Body Bling glitter tattoos are ideal for girls aged 6 years – but they will be adored by your teenaged girl as well!

  • Surprise Your Kids With A Fantastic Gift: spoil your children with a unique, super fun, and educational gift set that is great for birthday party activities for kids or sleepover games and the ideal way to spend some quality time as a family! 
  • Have Fun 100% Worry-Free: our bouncy balls kit is made using high-quality, kid-safe, and non-toxic materials. Rest assured, your boys and girls will be able to make their own DIY favors without any worries. 

Discover What Happens When Creativity Meets Science! 

If you are looking for an entertaining and engaging activity for your children, search no further. 
If your kids get quickly bored with arts and crafts projects, or they spend too much time watching TV, then the DIY bouncy ball kit offers the fun activity you need to pique their interest!  

Introducing The Bouncy Ball 12 Pack By Creative Kids! 

Let your kids unleash their creative talent and make unique bouncy balls with an easy 3-step science experiment that you can do together at home! 

Our bouncy ball kit maker comes with all the supplies you will need to get started. It includes 12 cups with the necessary powders, molds, and easy-to-follow instructions to help you and your kids make beautiful bouncy balls in different colors! 

Make Every Lazy Sunday Morning, 120% More Fun!  

Enjoy our unique kit on a rainy day or to keep your kids away from video games and TV screens. The make your own bouncy ball kit is a great way to have fun as a family while teaching your children how to follow instructions and help them improve their creative skills and hand-eye coordination!

Name: Build & Learn with 4 Dinosaurs Take Apart Toy Set
Description:
• BUILDABLE DINOSAUR MEGA SET – Complete Builders System Features 4 Ready-toAssemble Dino Building Kits for Hours of Creative Play & Educational Learning
  • EASY INTERCONNECTING PARTS – Design Kits Include Colorful Connecting Blocks to Make Cool Dinosaurs on Wheels; Great Supplies for School or Birthday Party
  • PERFECT FOR TODDLERS – Soft ABS Plastic Parts are Safely Sized for Tiny Hands; Watch Kids Explore, Build, Craft, Share & Independently Create Without Hazard
  • STEM STARTER KIT – Introduce Little Ones to Science, Architecture & Imagination While Stimulating Their Senses & Improving Hand-Eye Coordination & Motor Skills
  • CONVENIENT CONSTRUCTION TOOLS – Dinos are Simple to Assemble w/ Set of 3 Screwdrivers; See Them Build & Learn Engineering Fundamentals w/ Fun Figurines

A prehistoric approach to STEM fundamentals!

Install your child’s hunger for curiosity with the Build and Learn Dino by Young Hands. One of the most ferocious open-ended play sets to hit the playroom, this exciting 4-figurine kit includes colorful bricks, parts, rolling feet and other features resembling their favorite carnivorous creatures.

The extra large interlocking system allows boys and girls to build and take apart diverse dino characters, fostering hours of hands-on play.

Whether it’s a spiky Stegosaurus or terrifying Tyrannosaurus Rex, tots hone their fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, creativity, problem-solving, among other important developmental milestones.

Bring an educational twist to their next birthday party, and liven up playtime as they discover the wonder of STEM with a refreshingly simple toy & watch imaginations come alive!

Bring home classic children’s toys with an educational twist

From infants to toddlers to preschoolers and beyond, early childhood experts stress the importance of meaningful play. Parents need to mentally and emotionally stimulate their little ones with more than a movie or smartphone app. Exercising the mind doesn’t require a screen. In fact, the educational experts at Young Hands have a surprisingly simple answer—and it all goes back to one of the world’s most beloved children’s toys.

Boost their confidence one piece at a time

Today, it’s a sky-high tower. Tomorrow, it’s a terrifying T-Rex. See your child unlock their inner creativity and tune up their fine motor skills with Young Hands STEM-inspired interlocking block systems. Specially sized parts conveniently click and safely screw together, allowing mini architects to construct their very own structures, figures, characters and landscapes in a safe, easy, stimulating fashion. Our Build & Learn Dino set is a perfect addition to their complete Young Hands educational collection; the 4-figure set features dinosaur legs, arms, heads, wheeled feet and other fun blocks uniquely shaped for building their favorite prehistoric creatures.

Name: Build Your Own Dinosaur Models w/ Air Dry Modeling Clay
LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• BRING CREATIVITY TO LIFE - Discover A Whole New World Of Fun With Our All-Inclusive DIY Clay Dinosaur Kit, Which Will Allow Your Kids To Build Their Own 3D Clay Dinosaurs. Create Your Own Tyrannosaurus Rex, Stegosaurus And Triceratops Out Of Wood And Clay Today!
  • PLAY, CLAY, REPEAT - Help Your Kids Develop Fine Motor Skills, Hand-Eye Coordination, Problem-Solving Skills And Spark Your Child's Imagination And Creativity While Playing! Our Re-Sealable Clay Containers Will Prevent The Clay From Drying And Help Your Kids Re-Use It In The Future!
  • SOME CREATIVITY REQUIRED - Our Set Includes 15 X Containers Of Colorful Air Dry Clay, 3 X Wooden 3D Dinosaurs, 6 X Googly Eyes, 3 X Clay Sculpting Tools And Simple Instructions. All You Have To Add Is A Dash Of Creativity And A Pinch Of Imagination!
  • CLAY FINDS A WAY - Ideal For Both Boys And Girls Who Love 3D Puzzles And Clay Kits, Our STEM Arts And Crafts Set For Kids Will Make The Ideal Birthday Or Christmas Present For Your Son, Daughter, Nephew, Niece, Grandson Or Granddaughter!
  • GO AHEAD, MAKE MY CLAY! If You Want Your Toddler To Spend Less Time Watching TV, Playing Video Games Or Playing With Your Smartphone, Our Old-School Wooden Dinosaur Clay Activity Set Is Exactly What You Need, Go Ahead, Spoil Your Son, Daughter, Nephew, Niece, Granddaughter Or Grandson to the Ultimate Educational Clay Molding DIY Kit

3-D PUZZLES, AND DINOS, AND CLAY! OH MY!

If your little paleontologist loves dinosaurs, puzzles and moldable air dry clay, then he/she is in for a treat!

We have combined all the excitement of 3-D wooden puzzles, epic dinosaurs and kid-favorite air dry clay in order to offer your child a breath-taking activity set!

PRESENTING THE CLAY DINOSAUR KIT BY CREATIVE KIDS FOR CREATIVE KIDS!

We are thrilled to introduce you to our premium wooden dinosaurs, which are ready to keep your little ones occupied, engaged and entertained for hours on end!

Your little sculptor will be able to use his/her creativity, imagination and clay molding skills to create spine-tingling clay dinosaurs from scratch and develop valuable skills – while having fun!

AND THAT’S NOT ALL!

What makes our dino clay set stand out is that it includes EVERYTHING you might need in order to build your own T-Rex, Triceratops or Stegosaurus!

DON’T HESITATE! DIVE HEAD-FIRST IN A WORLD OF CLAY FUN!

STUN EVERYONE WITH YOUR ROAR-SOME DINOS!

Now you can create your own prehistoric era park filled with colorful clay dinosaurs with the Creative Kids DIY clay dino kit!

Use your imagination and creativity to add realistic details, create stunning color combinations and decorate three of the most iconic dinosaurs ever!

THE FUN IS NEVER DONE.

You can seal and re-use the air dry clay containers, so you can add further details in the future!

Name: Bulk Classroom Crayons - 36 Packs of 24 Crayon Sets
Description:
• 36 COUNT CLASSROOM CRAYON CASE – Jumbo Supplies Set Includes 3 Dozen Individual Coloring Crayon Sets for Endless Arts and Crafts & Learning Activities -
  • 24 VIBRANT COLORS PER PACK – Each Box Features a Vast Collection of Bold, Beautiful Shades of the Rainbow Including Blue, Yellow, Green, Red, Pink & More
  • HIGHEST QUALITY ARTIST WAX – Rich, Vivid Color Rolls on Paper Easy, Smooth, Even & Opaque; Perfect for Elementary Aged Kids, Toddlers, Middle School & More
  • SAFE & NON TOXIC FOR SCHOOL – Strong, Durable, Washable Crayons Come Conveniently Sharpened & Ready to Use; Conforms to ASTM D4236 for Safety
  • BUY IN BULK FOR BEST DISCOUNT – Enjoy Maximum Savings & Countless School Supplies Bulk Benefits When Purchasing the Whole Lot; Large, Sturdy Boxes for Neat Storage

Creativity comes in every color of the rainbow!

No classroom is complete without plenty of coloring and drawing supplies. The problem is, a teacher’s funds can only stretch so far.

When buying in bulk on a budget, you’re often met with cheap crayons that crumble and break after one use. If they do last, they leave little to no color on the page, making true masterpieces hard to come by.

For boys and girls to unleash their inner artists, they need high-quality arts and crafts supplies capable of surviving the entire school year. Now, with this massive lot of Bulk Classroom Crayons from Creative Kids, teachers everywhere can encourage greatness without breaking the piggy bank.

The convenient set arrives with 36 individual 24-crayon boxes—just the right amount to accommodate the average classroom.

Little ones color their world with maximum inspiration thanks to our safe, non-toxic crayons’ smooth-gliding action and rich, bold, opaque pigment. From preschool to play dates to party favors and beyond—draw more for your dollar, and add Creative Kids’ Bulk Classroom Crayons to your cart today!

Name: Candel making kit ASST
LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd

Name: Candle Making Kit for Adults
Description:
• CREATE SOMETHING THAT LOOKS PRETTY AND SMELLS GREAT - Our DIY candle making kit is perfect for teens and adults looking for something unique and fun to do. You can make at least 10 candles of different shapes, sizes, scents and colors. Our step by step instructions will make it easy for you to get beautiful looking candles, every time.
  • DATE NIGHT ACTIVITY OR FUN FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY - This is a great activity to enjoy with friends or family. Craft something fun and pure to embellish your home. Our unique candle wax kits are fun for all ages.
  • NOTHING ELSE IS NEEDED - We provide everything you need to start right away. Our all- inclusive kit comes with fashionable pots, molds, mixing pot, wax, scents and color pigments for your convenience. The pots provided will give your candles that special touch to turn ordinary candles into extraordinary home art.
  • A SCENT-SATIONAL GIFT - Gift these special homemade candles using the gift boxes and labels provided. Your loved ones will love receiving this gift from the heart.
  • WE WORRY ABOUT SAFETY SO YOU DON’T HAVE TO - Our wax is made of soy which comes from the oil of soybeans. They are safe to use and high quality. Soy wax burns clean and contains no additional harmful elements.

You’ve Got The Tools In Your Hand To Create Something Extraordinary

The perfect activity for a rainy day, this candle making kit is the ultimate craft for endless fun. You can make 10 candles and use different scents and colors to make unique pieces every time. Everything you might need to complete the project is included in the box. You even get gift boxes and labels so you could gift them forward.

Think Outside The Mold

We give you clear instructions, so this kit is perfect for anyone starting out on their creative journey or even for younger kids. You can put your own spin on your candle and add layers of different colored wax or crush in some flowers or gems into the wax. Let imagination be your guide!

Candle’ With Care

Get the family together for some quality creating time. Adults should always supervise and help kids in making these candles. You’ll need to heat up the wax and color pigments and then pour them into the molds. Choose between our many molds and tins for distinctive pieces every time. Melt your wax, mold your art, enjoy your creation.

Name: CCM COLOR COUNTING AND FUN
LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• Discover The Magic of Colors: Create 3 primary colors and use those to conduct the rest of your experiments. Make secondary colors, watch your colors fizz and learn to create color patterns with the Cocomelon Colors & Counting Fun kit.
  • Big Experiments for Little Chemists: We give you all the tools and materials necessary to complete 5 different color experiments. They are easy enough for kids to do on their own but adult supervision is recommended. Get ready to create all the colors of the rainbow!
  • Count with Cocomelon! You get 30 counting chips with an activity sheet that feature the Cocomelon family so you can get to know your favorite characters while learning numbers, patterns and colors. Combine entertainment and education for the ultimate activity.
  • Colorful Gift for Brilliant Kids. Nurture the little scientist in kids by offering an amazing gift that will keep them entertained for hours. They'll get a love for science and the world by understanding more of how everything around them works.
  • Safe and Quality Activity for Kids 3+. All materials included in this kit are non-toxic and safe for kids to use. This product meets and exceeds all U.S. and international testing standards.

S.T.E.M Education Made Fun

STEM education is important for your child’s overall development. It can improve creativity and develop education skills. This hands-on learning technique teaches kids science and chemistry concepts.

Kids learn and use their critical thinking and examine problems in a way that they can easily find solutions. STEM education prepares children to have valuable life skills that help them to be successful.

At Home Science Lab

We give you all the necessary ingredients to conduct 5 color chemistry experiments that are fun, easy and colorful! Kids will first create primary colors using fizzing color tablets, water and an activity tray.

Next, they will learn to mix their colors to create a rainbow of color! The rest of the experiments include fizzing colors, counting fun and sorting colors. It's the most hands-on way to teach kids all about creating different colors and patterns.

Bring science home with the Cocomelon Colors and Counting Fun kit.

S.T.E.M Education Made Fun

STEM education is important for your child’s overall development. It can improve creativity and develop education skills. This hands-on learning technique teaches kids science and chemistry concepts.

Kids learn and use their critical thinking and examine problems in a way that they can easily find solutions. STEM education prepares children to have valuable life skills that help them to be successful.

A Sight for Sore Eyes

Give kids an endlessly entertaining science kit that will help them appreciate their 5 senses. They’ll learn how each sense is used and will better understand their surroundings.

Kids love to learn and are always looking for ways to experiment. Provide them with the perfect starter kit to get them going on their learning journey.

They will get to blind taste random foods, play with and smell secret scented dough, roll textured balls on dough to create many patterns, create a musical sound stick and find Cocomelon characters with their very own magnifier. Sensory adventure awaits!

Name: Creative Kids Jumbo Gem Art
LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• Create Dazzling Art: Design your own stickers, suncatchers, magnets and keychains with this 1200+ pcs set. Everything is include; Put gem pen to sticker paper and unleash imagination 
  • Big Gems for Little Hands: The large size of the gems makes it easy for little ones to lift the gems and place them on the designated characters; The unicorn pen keeps the creative process magical 
  • Bedazzle Your Bedroom: The beautiful suncatchers will add mystical light to your walls. Decorate with your bedroom and prized possessions with unique stickers, magnets and keychains 
  • Free of Mess, Full of Magic! Use the unicorn paint pen and wax to lift the gems and place them on the magical characters in a process that is easy, fun, and mess-free 
  • The Creative Kid’s Promise: this craft kit contains non-toxic and safe materials but should be kept out of small children’s reach; Kids 6+ will be endlessly entertained with this mess-free activity 

A Diamond in the Rough 

Turn ordinary characters into extraordinary gem art. First, dip your unicorn pen into wax so you can get a good grip on your gems. Then, peel back the top layer of the sticky dots stencil and place your gems along the outline. Follow along the color pattern or create your own! The finished design can be used to create suncatchers, stickers, magnets or keychains. You'll get 25 gem art masterpieces that will show off your creativity and produce a useful keepsake.                                  

There are enough materials for lots of people to get creative so have your friends join in on the fun! Nurture your creative spirit and work on important fine motor skills while making something that’s truly a gem.

Helping Kids Reach Important Milestones 

Light up magical characters with vibrant gems while working on important fine motor skills. By peeling, pressing and sticking your child exercises their hand and finger muscles which then makes it easier to do everyday tasks. They'll develop hand-eye coordination, color recognition, patience, and improve their social ability to play with friends. Provide a unique way of working on developmental skills while enjoying hours of fun.

Air-dry clay is a great sensory play material that will soothe the senses while helping kids work on important fine motor skills.

Indulge the sense of touch with the velvety soft feel of the clay. Sensory play can calm the mind and help build nerve connection in the brain.

Give kids a soothing activity that will help them reach important milestones while exercising their creative potential.

Description:
• BIG EXPERIMENT FOR LITTLE SCIENTISTS. The Energy Rod from Be Amazing! Toys is just what you need to conduct your own science experiment. Watch as the Energy Rod lights up and creates fun sounds as you help it conduct electricity through your body.
  • LEARN THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN INSULATORS AND CONDUCTORS: Now you have the opportunity to see the way electricity travels through different materials and even though your body forming circuits.
  • FLASHING BRIGHT LED LIGHT INDICATOR: The Be Amazing Toys Energy Rod comes equipped with a bright LED light for you to be able to see whether or not an electric circuit is open or closed. Lights on or off?
  • THE PERFECT GIFT FOR EVERY KID: Instead of offering dull board games or dolls to your kids, surprise them with a unique science kit for kids, which can also act as a great sleepover activity.
  • 100% SAFE TO TOUCH AND HANDLE: Our circuit stick is absolutely safe to use with bare hands. The finest materials are used for the creation of our electric circuits for kids for their safety.

Introducing the Energy Rod: The Ultimate Electricity Conductor by Be Amazing! Toys!

The Be Amazing! Toys Energy Rod will offer many fun hours to your children while they are learning all about electricity. The circuit rod with the flashing LED lights of our STEM toy will help your kids explore and understand everything about conductors and insulators in the safest way.

The Energy Rod is the coolest tool in experimenting with open and closed circuits. Completely safe to touch and handle, the Energy Rod features electrodes on each end of its 7.5″ long tube.

When these electrodes are touched simultaneously, long-lasting LED lights inside the tube flash and the tube makes a noise. Release one of the electrodes and the flashing lights and noise stop. Do it over and over… it works every time!
ShortDescription: Energy Rod by Be Amazing! Toys - Sensor Stick Sci-Fi Tube with Flashing LED Light

Name: DIY Crystal Growing Experiment Kit for Kids
Description:
• TAKE SCIENCE TO THE MAX: Brighten your kid's day with an engaging science experiment that will make science class look a lot more exciting: The Science To The Max crystal growing kit for kids will introduce your child to science in a fun way.
  • BIGGER, BETTER, BRIGHTER CRYSTALS: Your son or daughter will grow bigger, better, and glitterier crystals thanks to our new, advanced Hydro-Glow technology. Every light up crystal growing kit makes up to 4 large crystals.
  •  DISPLAY YOUR KID'S CRYSTALS WITH PRIDE: Help your kid impress his/her friends with a beautiful dome display with eye-popping LED lighting. The illuminated display case will make your kid's crystals pop in the dark and dazzle everyone.
  • SPOIL YOUR CURIOUS LITTLE SCIENTIST: Surprise your son, daughter, nephew, niece, grandson, granddaughter or students with an all-inclusive crystal grow kit for children and engage them in a brilliant, educational activity.
  • NO SPECIAL SKILLS NEEDED: This crystal growing experimental kit includes all the necessary supplies for 4 big and sparkling crystals. Just follow the simple, illustrated instructions and your kid’s magnificent crystals will be ready in just 7 days. Packaging may vary.

Science Class Has Never Been This Exciting!

Discover the Science To The Max grow your own crystals kit for kids.

Spark your child’s imagination, creativity, and scientific curiosity with a STEM crystal growing lab kit that will make growing crystals easy and interesting.

Keep your little ones engaged and entertained for hours with a convenient crystal making kit for boys and girls of all ages.

This crystal making kit will make you wish you had it as a kid.

Help your child spend less time playing video games or watching cartoons and more time enjoying a real scientific experiment at the comfort of your home.

This hands-on chemical experiment requires no special knowledge but it will definitely trigger your kid’s curiosity and thirst for knowledge.

And the best part? Your kid will have 4 chunky crystals to show off at the end of the experiment.

It’s Crystal Clear: Your Kid Will Love This Crystal Science Kit.

Your kid will embark on a breath-taking scientific adventure with the Science To The Max crystal grow kit. Replace boring board games or constructions sets with a real-life scientific wonder that will develop in front of your kid’s eyes.

Name: DIY Hand Casting Kit
LastSuppliedBy: Neture(Xiamen) Industries Co., LTD
Description:
• A UNIQUE EXPERIENCE IS IN YOUR HAND. The Craft It Up hand molding kit includes everything you need to make your own hand mold or newborn hand and feet keepsake. This is a great couples activity or even a solo one! Our step-by-step instructions make this kit great even for beginners.
  • CREATE ONE OF A KIND KEEPSAKES with your spouse, kids, or loved ones. Our plaster hand mold casting kit will allow you to make and then decorate your own statue.
  • EVERYTHING YOU NEED IS HERE: What are you waiting for? This hand plaster casting kit includes all the necessary accessories, such as plaster powder, sandpaper, paintbrush, silver, and gold paint, and more!
  • UNIQUE GIFTS FOR YOUR LOVED ONES: If you are looking for meaningful anniversary gifts, beautiful wedding presents or craft kits for adults who love DIY projects, look no further than the Craft It Up premium hand casting molding kit for couples kids, and loved ones
  • ORDER YOUR HAND MOLD KIT RISK-FREE: Our mission is to help you enjoy your limited free time with an activity that will offer you calmness and peace of mind. That is exactly why we ensure the safety and quality of your hand statue kit.

The Die Is Cast: This Is The Ultimate Hand Casting Kit For Adults!

If you are looking for a tasteful way to capture all the love and the sentiment of one moment through time, we have got the ideal solution for you. With our molding kit, you can create the most beautiful sculptures of anything you hold dear and preserve the memory as the years pass by.

Introducing The Craft It Up Premium Hand Casting Kit!

The Craft It Up Hand Casting plaster kit is an easy to use leisure craft kit, with which you can create a beautiful, heartwarming decorative sculpture of your hands, your baby’s feet, your whole family’s hands holding lovingly one another or anything else you can imagine.

It’s so simple to keep the memories alive that anyone can do it without any special skills or sculpting knowledge.

Always Remember The Days When Their Feet Would Fit In Your Hand

Our Hand Casting Kit is perfect for creating a sentimental keepsake for years to come. The unique sculpture will decorate your home in a refined way based 100% on your taste.

Get creative and include everyone in the family to work as a team to think of and form a one-of-a-kind sculpture that is going to represent your family and the love you share. Work together and make the bond between your family members even stronger.

Name: DIY Headband Kit- Create Your Own Headbands
Description:
• Design Your Own Headwear: create colorful headbands with this 65-piece headband maker kit that includes scrunchies, hair clips & other accessories too! 
  • Contains Magical Accessories: decorate with gems, flowers, feathers, ribbons and more. You even get a unicorn horn to add mystical energy to your headband creation. 
  • Big Entertainment for Little Fashionistas! This DIY fashion kit comes with simple instructions for easy use. It’s a perfect entertainment addition to any birthday party, play date or sleepover. 
  • An Unforgettable Gift for Any Special Occasion: surprise a loved one with this unique gift that will keep them creatively occupied for hours. 
  • Everything’s Included! All you need to get started is included in this kit. The toxic-free and high-quality supplies will make for long lasting accessories.  

Starter Kit for Future Fashion Icons 

Kids love making their own accessories. They can work alone or together with their friends to create shiny hairpieces and glittery accessories. They will style personalized headbands in a variety of designs. Our headband making set for kids includes all you need to create 16 rainbow hairpieces made to wear, share and enjoy! 

Included in the box is 60+ craft pieces that are easy to use in little hands, as well as simple, colorful instructions that will help young crafters create headbands with confidence. 

Share the Creativity  

Encourage social skills by having friends join in on the fun! There are enough supplies for a few of your BFFs to try their hand at hair fashion design too. 

Combine rainbow fabric flowers, unicorn horns, rhinestones, vibrant pom-poms and ribbons to make boutique-style headbands that match your outfits. This creative kids’ craft set gives children the chance to learn, pretend and explore their artistic talent, enhance their motor skills, color recognition and hand-eye coordination.

Name: EGG-CELLENT EXPERIMENTS
LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• Big Experiments for Little Scientists, 6 egg-shaped science kits are included for endless knowledge and fun. Follow along to create over 12 experiments that are easy to do and sensory based.
  • Hatch an Egg-citing Experiment, each science kit comes in a unique egg shape that will pique kids' interest and excite them for experimenting. Crack open each ‘egg’ to reveal different activities within each one.
  • Over 12 Activities for Endless Fun Each of the 6 eggs holds 2 experiments that will keep kids busy for hours. Some even have a bonus activity! All you need to conduct your experiments are included in our all-inclusive kit.
  • Easter Egg Hunt: keep kids away from candy and chocolate on their Easter egg hunt by providing something educational and entertaining. They also made a great stocking stuffer for Christmas!

Educate, Entertain and Enlighten Kids About the Wonders of Science

Science to the Max brings you an innovative way to introduce kids to the wonders around them. Science can be overwhelming, so we’ve created the perfect way to ease kids into it. Crack open each egg individually to unveil different activities in each kit. 2 experiments are included in every egg but some even have a bonus activity!

Hear the ooohs and aahs as kids discover how fun and entertaining science can be. They'll learn about polymers and different areas of chemistry as they create faux snow, crystals, water gel and so much more! Follow along the instructions that are provided in each egg to learn the science behind each of the experiments. This kit will educate as much as it will entertain!

LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• GET STARTED WITH CLASSIC ARTS AND CRAFTS with this high-end kid sewing kit, which will inspire them to create over 15 of their favorite hero characters and add a dose of enchantment to their room.
  • DEVELOP YOUR CHILD'S SEWING SKILLS: Including 10x15-yard skeins of thread, 25 felt squares, scissors, needles, pin, buttons and keychains, this complete sewing accessories kit will get your kids hooked.
  • HAVE YOUR OWN AT-HOME OPEN STUDIO DAY: The step-by-step instructions included will help children sew a mermaid, star, jellyfish, a doughnut or ice cream keychain and have an art show of their incredible works.
  • SHARPEN YOUR CHILD'S PRACTICAL SKILLS: Your kid does not need a sewing machine to unleash his creativity! Our mini sewing kit will keep him creative, cultivate his imagination, critical thinking and imagination.
  • KEEP YOUR KIDS HAPPILY BUSY EVERYWHERE: Coming in a handy storage box, your kids' first sewing kit is easy to carry. Offer it to any child -12, as an irresistible birthday, holiday or Christmas gift! Packaging may vary.

Get The Ultimate Kids Starter Set For Awesome Sewing Craft Projects!

Raise Happier, Smarter, More Creative Children!

Introducing The Fun Felt Sewing Kit For Kids, by Creative Kids!

Kids have a short attention span and get bored soon. Standard dolls, toy cars, and puzzles fail to attract their interest for long, especially after they reach school age. With this in mind, we manufactured a creative craft project kit, which will get your child involved in the constructive play- indoors or outdoors!

Let Your Kids Craft Their Way To Happiness! Help Them Get Creative & Relieve Boredom!

Over 15 of all kids’ favorite characters take flesh and bones in the hands of crafters. Find in the box all necessary materials for your children to get started and create a cute felt mermaid, shooting star, heart, unicorn or cloud that will add magic dust to their bedroom – or make a doughnut or ice cream keychain that will have their friends asking questions!

Treat Your Kids To An Easy To Use Sewing Kit – For Home, The Playdate & Your Travels!

Even absolute beginner artists will be impressed with their own abilities after tackling these sewing projects! The step-by-step instructions included help your child complete the tasks with confidence. And the colorful storage box makes transportation of their sewing kit easier. Take it on all your out and about –you never know when inspiration comes!

Name: Grow Your Own Crystal Pod Pack for Kids
LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• SCIENCE AT ITS FINEST - Be your own little scientist and discover the wonders of crystal growing. Your little one will love our crystal growing kit with its easy to use instructions and 3 vibrant crystal powders to choose from.
  • GROW’ BIG OR GO HOME - With our new hydro-grow formula, you’ll get bigger and better crystals than ever before. The kit includes 3 seeds and powders that will make 3 different colored crystals. Your kids will fall in love with its unique design and will love displaying it in their room.
  • NO ADDITIONAL TOOLS REQUIRED - Our kit has everything you need to make your own crystal garden. It includes 3 crystal seeds, 3 crystal growing cups, 3 display cases and all the other tools required to help your mini scientist make 3 sparkling crystals.
  • GROW A GIFT OR GIFT THIS GROWING CRYSTAL KIT - Surprise your kids, grandkids, nieces, nephews or anyone else with this awesome birthday, Christmas or holiday gift. Kids can even grow the crystals and then give them to their friends as a totally unique and special present.
  • SCIENCE AND SAFETY TO THE MAX - Our products are safe and fun to use. Your satisfaction is guaranteed with our Crystal Pod Pack. If your kids don’t absolutely love this product, reach out to us and we’ll make it right.

It’s Crystal Clear, Kids Will Love This Project

Science has never been this much fun before! Get ready for an easy science experiment that will blow your mind! All you’ll need to do is add our special powder to hot water, mix it well, and then add your crystal seed. It’s as easy as 1-2-3. Our step by step instructions will make it easy for kids to follow along and they'll even learn how natural crystals grow and are formed.

With a Little Help, They’ll Go a Long Way

Kids will need a little help boiling the water for this experiment. Otherwise, they can mostly do it on their own. Build their confidence by letting them discover their scientific abilities and independence. Kids will learn precision and patience because the crystal needs 7 days to fully grow! They’ll wake up every morning eager to check the progress of their crystal.

Display Them With Pride

Included are 3 custom dome displays with clear covers so kids can show off what they’ve accomplished. These crystals will brighten up their room or can be given as a gift. Your kid’s friends will surely love receiving this unique and homemade gift.

The Die Is Cast: This Is The Ultimate Hand Casting Kit For Adults!

If you are looking for a tasteful way to capture all the love and the sentiment of one moment through time, we have got the ideal solution for you. With our molding kit, you can create the most beautiful sculptures of anything you hold dear and preserve the memory as the years pass by.

Introducing The Craft It Up Premium Hand Casting Kit!

The Craft It Up Hand Casting plaster kit is an easy to use leisure craft kit, with which you can create a beautiful, heartwarming decorative sculpture of your hands, your baby’s feet, your whole family’s hands holding lovingly one another or anything else you can imagine.

It’s so simple to keep the memories alive that anyone can do it without any special skills or sculpting knowledge.

Always Remember The Days When Their Feet Would Fit In Your Hand

Name: HANDS ON LIGHTING ROD
LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• BIG EXPERIMENT FOR LITTLE SCIENTISTS. The Energy Rod from Be Amazing! Toys is just what you need to conduct your own science experiment. Watch as the Energy Rod lights up and creates fun sounds as you help it conduct electricity through your body.
  • LEARN THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN INSULATORS AND CONDUCTORS: Now you have the opportunity to see the way electricity travels through different materials and even though your body forming circuits.
  • FLASHING BRIGHT LED LIGHT INDICATOR: The Be Amazing Toys Energy Rod comes equipped with a bright LED light for you to be able to see whether or not an electric circuit is open or closed. Lights on or off?
  • THE PERFECT GIFT FOR EVERY KID: Instead of offering dull board games or dolls to your kids, surprise them with a unique science kit for kids, which can also act as a great sleepover activity.
  • 100% SAFE TO TOUCH AND HANDLE: Our circuit stick is absolutely safe to use with bare hands. The finest materials are used for the creation of our electric circuits for kids for their safety.

Introducing the Energy Rod: The Ultimate Electricity Conductor by Be Amazing! Toys!

The Be Amazing! Toys Energy Rod will offer many fun hours to your children while they are learning all about electricity. The circuit rod with the flashing LED lights of our STEM toy will help your kids explore and understand everything about conductors and insulators in the safest way.

The Energy Rod is the coolest tool in experimenting with open and closed circuits. Completely safe to touch and handle, the Energy Rod features electrodes on each end of its 7.5″ long tube.

When these electrodes are touched simultaneously, long-lasting LED lights inside the tube flash and the tube makes a noise. Release one of the electrodes and the flashing lights and noise stop. Do it over and over… it works every time!
ShortDescription: Energy Rod by Be Amazing! Toys - Sensor Stick Sci-Fi Tube with Flashing LED Light

Name: Hydro Zzand Play Sand Art Kit 10 Pack Individual Colored Castle
Description:
• Discover The Ultimate Hydro Zzand Pack: create your own kingdom with the Hydro ZZand! Our sand art kits for kids have everything you will need to start making unique and colorful castles with your children! 
  • Mold Underwater Shapes Using The New Zzand Formula: our unique formula allows you to sculpt and play with the sand, and effortlessly mold it into any shape you want without falling apart under the water! 
  • One Kit With Everything You Need: our sandcastle kit includes 10 castle molds and 10 containers with Hydro ZZand in 5 vibrant colors. Use clay dough tools or cookie cutters to add special touches to your artwork! Creativity has no limits! 
  • Spoil Your Kids With A Great Gift: surprise your children with the wonderful sensory sand set for endless moments of fun! It is perfect for group activities, and you can even use it during bath time to create underwater castles in the bathtub! 
  • Have More Fun And Less Worries: our sand for kids is made of high-quality, non-toxic materials and it is specifically designed to stick only to itself so you can sculpt it easily, and keep your clothes and your hands clean! 

Dive Into The World Of Hydro Sand And Create A Real Underwater Kingdom! 

 

An artistic and fun activity for you & your kids. 

 

If your children get easily bored with classic art activities like painting, our Hydro Zzand kit is the ideal alternative that will intrigue them to get more creative and build their own sand city under the water!  

Introducing The Sand Kits for Kids by ZZand! 

The hydro-Zzand sand mold kit puts a modern spin on the classic arts and crafts activities, allowing kids to create their own sandcastles that can hold their shape underwater! 

The sand mold kit has everything you need to get started, including 10 castle mold containers in 5 primary colors of Hydro Zzand, so you can make beautiful and detailed castle shapes with your kids. 

One Art Kit For Endless Creativity! 

 

Spend some quality time with your children with this calming and relaxing molding activity. 

 
The velvet-soft colorful sand will stimulate your kids' senses while boosting their creativity and improving their fine motor skills. 

 
Plus, it is an amusing arts and crafts hobby that will keep your kids entertained for hours while they sculpt, mold, and create a unique underwater world!

Help Your Kids Explore the Human Body

If you are looking for a way to make biology lessons fun, challenge your kids with anatomy, and ignite curiosity at the same time, then we have got the ideal STEM toy for you. Teach your kids all about the functions of a human body.

Introducing the Interactive Human Body Model for Kids by Be Amazing! Toys!

The Be Amazing! Toys Interactive Human Body is a STEM toy designed to educate children about the human body, its parts, and different functions. Made with top quality materials, our human body is kid-friendly and will offer many fun hours to your young ones along with so much knowledge gained effortlessly through play.

Name: JUMBO GEM ART
LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• Create Dazzling Art: Design your own stickers, suncatchers, magnets and keychains with this 1200+ pcs set. Everything is include; Put gem pen to sticker paper and unleash imagination 
  • Big Gems for Little Hands: The large size of the gems makes it easy for little ones to lift the gems and place them on the designated characters; The unicorn pen keeps the creative process magical 
  • Bedazzle Your Bedroom: The beautiful suncatchers will add mystical light to your walls. Decorate with your bedroom and prized possessions with unique stickers, magnets and keychains 
  • Free of Mess, Full of Magic! Use the unicorn paint pen and wax to lift the gems and place them on the magical characters in a process that is easy, fun, and mess-free 
  • The Creative Kid’s Promise: this craft kit contains non-toxic and safe materials but should be kept out of small children’s reach; Kids 6+ will be endlessly entertained with this mess-free activity 

A Diamond in the Rough 

Turn ordinary characters into extraordinary gem art. First, dip your unicorn pen into wax so you can get a good grip on your gems. Then, peel back the top layer of the sticky dots stencil and place your gems along the outline. Follow along the color pattern or create your own! The finished design can be used to create suncatchers, stickers, magnets or keychains. You'll get 25 gem art masterpieces that will show off your creativity and produce a useful keepsake.                                  

There are enough materials for lots of people to get creative so have your friends join in on the fun! Nurture your creative spirit and work on important fine motor skills while making something that’s truly a gem.

Helping Kids Reach Important Milestones 

Light up magical characters with vibrant gems while working on important fine motor skills. By peeling, pressing and sticking your child exercises their hand and finger muscles which then makes it easier to do everyday tasks. They'll develop hand-eye coordination, color recognition, patience, and improve their social ability to play with friends. Provide a unique way of working on developmental skills while enjoying hours of fun.

LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• At home lab for little chemists bring science home with our lab-in-a-bag chemist set kids will love experimenting with these reusable test tubes and will learn something educational while having a great time.
  • Conduct over 15 science experiments our kit comes equipped with materials and instructions that will allow you to make over 15 awesome experiments you’ll get to create touchable bubbles, bouncy balls, 20 feet of slimy worms and much more
  • Follow along for easy fun you get a clear and colorful instruction manual that’s easy to follow along we’ve made science fun by providing experiments that don’t take too long and won’t bore impatient kids
  • Reusable test tubes proceed with imagination our unbreakable test tubes can be used again and again create your own science experiments using liquids around the house

Multiple Experiments Wrapped in One Package

Science has never been more fun! Our STEM chemistry set will teach kids all about chemical reactions and polymers. You get 5 unbreakable tubes and each contains up to three unique activities. Unleash your kids into the science world and let them explore this exciting and educational adventure.

Up and Atom! Let’s Get Experimenting

Get ready to be amazed as you create fun projects that will blow your mind! Name: LIQUID TIMER
LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• Time(r) for Sensory Play: Keep kids entertained for hours with a stress-relieving toy that is pleasing to the senses; 2 is better than one so you get 2 connected liquid timers to enjoy; Flip the timer over and watch as gravity pulls the bubbles down at a slow pace and causes the spinners to spin
  • Treat Your Senses: Develop coordination and exploration with the Sense and Grow Products; Improve hand-eye coordination, color recognition, and visual tracking as you explore the sense of sight with this magnificent timer.
  • Calm the Mind: The dual liquid timer is great for reducing stress and anxiety; It provides a calming effect that helps children with autism, SPD, or ADHD stay focused due to the rhythmic and mesmerizing reaction of the bubbles
  • Big Gift for Little Ones: Give a gift that will delight parents as well as kids; It's the perfect holiday or birthday present that will keep them entertained long after the party is over
  • Helping Reach Your Child’s Goals: Introduce your kids to the magnificent textures and colors all around them; Our products are especially made to help kids explore, play and reach their developmental goals

We Give You the Tools, You Provide the Imagination

Promote sensory development with a product that will provide endless entertainment. Give kids a form of self-expression that will help them express and cope with their feelings.

As visual motor and creativity skills get developed, it will provide opportunities for trying out new ideas and promote new ways of thinking and problem solving.

Parents can follow along in the sensory guide provided on each Sense and Grow product box to learn about the importance of sensory play and fine motor development.

They will recognize the advantages of the sensory items and all it provides for their child’s well-being and overall development. By working on these important skills in a fun way, kids will be able to complete important tasks, such as buttoning and zippering, much easier.

Add a Sprinkle of Fairy Dust for Ultimate Creativity 

Immerse yourself in a mystical world full of fairies and potions where everything is ripe with magic. Make new fairy friends as you collect ingredients for your magic potions. Follow along the detailed recipe book to create 9 different potions for various uses. Each sparkly ingredient comes straight from the fairy gardens so you know they will definitely work! Each potion even comes with a spell to chant to activate the magic in the bottle. You can create potions for luck, happiness, sunshine, friendship & much more! You can even cook up your own potion recipe! 

Give kids the gift of confidence with mystical elixirs that encourage self-expression. Mixing your own potions is the ultimate pretend play outlet. It keeps kids entertained for hours mixing, developing, & enjoying their own spell concoctions. Place your ready potions on the butterfly display to show off your creative work!  

Enchanting Bonus Toys Included 

Get excited for all the extra perks this kit contains. Flip the box inside out to reveal a magical fairy house; decorate the home with the many colorful stickers included. You even get punch-out fairies that come with their own cardboard stands. Set up a full mystical land with all the fairy accessories & potions. Create a space in your room for your fairy display to keep the potions at hand for whenever a little bit of magic is needed!

Name: Miracle Gro Paint and Plant My First Flower Growing Kit
Description:
• Let it Grow! You get Marigold, Cosmos & Zinnia seeds so you can plant, decorate & grow a DIY garden 
  • Paint Your Planter: decorate your gardening planter with the paints & brush included in this kit. 
  • What You Get: tin planter, 6 paints, brush, shovel, 3 seed packs, 3 soil pods, 3 plant markers & more 
  • Help Kids Grow: improve fine motor skills, gain a sense of responsibility & indulge their artistic skills 
  • Miracle Gro helps support a greener world & is committed to bringing the benefits of gardening to kids 

Plant the Seed of Creativity 

Designing your own garden has never been this easy or fun! We give you all the products needed to plant 3 types of beautiful flowers to decorate your room or windowsill. Kids will exercise their hand & finger muscles when digging, planting, & watering their little creations. They will improve important fine motor skills that aid in their overall development. They will learn patience as they wait days, or even weeks, for their flowers to bloom. There are many unbe-leaf-able benefits to gardening. 

Follow along in our step-by-step guide that makes it easy for kids 6 and up to start planting on their own. They will learn many useful tips & tricks for taking care of their blossoming creation & for decorating their planter. Everything needed to create a DIY garden is included in the My First Flower Growing Kit. Kids will get to design their own planter, mix their own soil, & plant 3 different types of seeds. They will be able to appreciate their hard work & grow their confidence as they say ‘aloe’ to their custom garden.

Name: Musical Puppet Theater by Creative Kids Make Your Own Hand and Finger Puppets
Description:
• Puppet Arts & Craft To Encourage Imagination: The Creative Kids Musical Puppet Theater kit provides a perfect group or solitary activity for creative expression and imaginative play. Help your kids unleash their creativity today! 
  • Support Your Kid's Fine Motor Skills :  Our puppet making kit for kids stimulates your child's development. By making animal characters using paper bags, your kid improves their fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination. 
  • Music To Your Ears: Our kit includes everything you need to complete 7 puppets, including 2 music cards! Your kids will love the realistic effect these animal noises will bring to their custom puppets.  
  • ‘Hand’ Them A Unique Craft: This set of paper bag crafts for kids makes a fantastic birthday or Christmas gift for kids 4-8 and a great choice for a kids' themed party, costume party, or school show. 
  • Order Your Puppet Crafts Set With Confidence: Made of premium, non-toxic materials, this kid-friendly hand puppet making kit is easy to use and 100% safe for toddlers, preschoolers, and schoolboys and girls. 

Put On A Puppet Show That Will Blow Their Mind! 

You can now spark your child’s creativity with a unique art and craft supplies kit. Wonderful for young kids and great for rainy days, our DIY puppet making kit includes a range of materials to create fully customizable characters for long hours of imaginative pretend play at home, in the classroom, or at summer camp.  

Introducing The Musical Puppet Theater By Creative Kids! 

Most of us have played with puppets or have pretended to be a ventriloquist and tried out different quirky voices. When we were young, puppets were mainly for entertainment purposes; however, many educators worldwide are using puppets to instill learning in young children. Our paper bag puppets kit is designed to entertain your kid and cultivate his learning and emotional skills. 

Lights...Camera...Action! 

Kids will get to create their own custom art by assembling hand and finger animal puppets. You even get 2 music cards that play animal noises to give your puppet a realistic and unique feel. Have them put on a show that will boost their confidence, creative thinking and speaking skills. They'll get to design, produce and star in their very own puppet shows!

Name: My Spa Experience – Ultimate Kids Spa Kit
Description:
• HER FIRST SPA EXPERIENCE – All-in-One Manicure, Pedicure & Facial Collection Includes All the REAL Supplies Little Girls Need to Perform Spa Treatments at Home
  • EVERY NAIL SALON ESSENTIAL – Kids Paint & Decorate Their Nails w/ [5] Polishes, Nail File, Dryer, Toe Separators, Sticky Decals, Cotton Balls & [4] Sets of Fake Nails
  • RELAXING FOOT BATH & BEADS – Pack Pampers Them Like Mom w/ Fun Inflatable Pedicure Pool, Slippers & Massaging Gel Beads That Grow 100X Their Original Size
  • TONS OF EXTRA ACCESSORIES – Bulk Package Also Includes Eye & Face Mask, Dryer Sticker & Pretty Satin Bag for Keeping Their Stash Neatly Stored & Organized
  • AMAZING BIRTHDAY PARTY IDEA – Give Your Girl the Ultimate On-Trend Group Celebration w/ a Day at the Spa; Use the Vast Assortment of Gifts as Party Favors

Spoil her with the ultimate spa experience!

Little girls love to be pampered, just like their mommas. Now, with My Spa Experience from B Me, kids can relax, unwind and discover what it’s like to truly escape!

This all-in-one collection comes with absolutely everything they need to do real manicures, pedicures, foot massages, facials and other fun, fabulous treatments at home. Whether she’s indulging herself after school or entertaining a crowd at a sleepover, the kit promises hours and hours of soothing comfort and creative stimulation.

Best of all, My Spa Experience includes no fake makeup or play-pretend toys. Designed for little ladies ages 6 and up, each individual supply is 100% real and ready to apply.

From bubbly spa foot baths and luxurious pedicures to pretty press-on nails and stylish stickers and decals galore, there are so many ideas for jazzing up her daily routine. So no more worrying about those expensive ‘kiddie manicures’ at the local salon. Save your cash, and let your artistic youngster run the spa herself!

Budding beauties love a good pamper party

The fact is, little girls grow up way too fast. By the time they can walk, they’re already wearing mom’s heels, spritzing her perfume and digging into her makeup drawer at every turn.

These activities aren’t superficial—they’re crucial for kids’ development, especially when it comes to fostering creativity, imagination and the art of relaxation. Toy makeup and pretend nail polish just won’t cut it! To fill her heart with true excitement, you need to swap Barbie for a bathrobe.

A day at the spa just got real!

Finally, with My Spa Experience, thoughtful parents can give the gift of peace and tranquility. This massive set includes everything kids need to have their very first spa day experience. From foot massage treatments and facials to colorful manicures and pedicures, the all-in-one collection comes ready to play so there’s no need to pay the professionals.

Show her how to paint her nails, soak her feet, wear her slippers and prance around the house without a care in the world. Birthdays and slumber parties will never be the same—so add My Spa Experience to your cart today!

Our crystal, quicksand, and lava lamp science kit comes with so many experimentation options for those young scientists to have a starting point for their magical journey through a world full of surprises and discover all the different forms matter can take while having a blast.

Name: Paint Your Own Unicorn Glitter Globe Craft Kit
Description:
• ALL-INCLUSIVE PAINT YOUR OWN UNICORN KIT: Everything your kid needs to create the most whimsical unicorn and fairytale snow globe is here. Our complete paint kit for kids includes all the necessary accessories, paints, and tools!
  • CREATE YOUR OWN SNOW GLOBE & MINI UNICORNS: Our unicorn painting set will offer your child the opportunity to make his/her own magical snow globe, clay rainbows, and adorable mini unicorns! Surprise a loved one with this unique present for their birthday or Christmas.
  • GLITTER, AND SPARKLE AND MAGIC, OH MY: This mega-value unicorn craft kit for kids includes 1 x paint your own ceramic unicorn, 1 x snow globe, 12 x paint pods, glitter, stickers, rhinestones, and many more magical accessories!
  • A TOUCH OF MAGIC: You get a bonus gift when purchasing this kit! Use the 4 tubes of glitter to create magic potions and cast a spell on your friends! Mix your glitters together to form all kinds of magical potions.
  • ORDER YOUR B ME KIDS SET WITH CONFIDENCE: The kid-safe design combined with the non-toxic materials will make this girls’ arts and crafts kit ideal for your child. Every single B. Me product is backed by our no-nonsense guarantee – for your peace of mind.

Sparkle Up Your Kid’s Afternoons!

If you’re looking for a way to keep your kids happily occupied and away from tablets and cell phones, we have got the solution for you! Our craft kits offer much more to their mental development. They’ll be so proud to realize they’re artistic potential and will have so much fun creating.

Even if your kids get easily bored you can be sure that they won’t be able to keep their hands off this project.

Introducing The Ultimate Ceramic Painting Kit for Kids by B Me!

Encourage your little artists to get creative and let their wild imaginations loose.

Rainbow colors, fun stickers, and a lot of glitters will be the perfect companions in this magical journey through a fantasy world. Watch them create a beautiful unicorn glitter globe, starting from scratch, and have the time of their lives in the meantime!

Join your children, color with them, have fun with the stickers, get messy, sparkle up, and bond with them through fun and games.

Every Day Is A Sparkling Unicorn Day!

There is not a day, a moment, or an occasion that is not right for some creative activities! Picture this: It’s a rainy, dark day and you are sitting in your room gloomy and bored out of your mind wishing for something interesting to happen.

And Then… Magic, Sparkle, And Glitter Fill Up The Entire Room!

The B Me clay unicorn kit is here to bring the colors of the rainbow and the magical fairy sparkles of a unicorn in your life! It’s also the perfect activity to cheer up a slow birthday party. Create teams and see who can make the most mesmerizing globe. The Sky's the limit with this unicorn craft kit.

Name: PULL ALONG SENSORY BOX
LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• FULLY EQUIPPED SENSORY TOY TODDLER ACTIVITY PLUSH BOX - The Young Hands preschool learning tissue box with sensory scarves includes everything you need to promote the development of fine motor skills for your children. We’ve added a light weighted bottom to the box, so it doesn’t get easily pulled along and helps for effective play.
  • PROMOTE STEM EDUCATION - This sensory play rainbow scarf set is designed to engage young children and toddlers in a fun and exciting way that may help them develop their problem-solving ability & color sorting while having fun.
  • YOUR KIDS WILL DISCOVER DIFFERENT TEXTURES - Our sensory toys for babies and toddlers comes with many textures to trigger your kids' senses. Crinkled tissues, a uniquely fun designed plush tissue box, and many more are included.
  • A COLORFUL ALTERNATIVE - Babies love playing with tissue boxes and paper, so we’ve created a safe and fun replacement. This sensory tissue box will entertain babies for hours with its vibrant colors, crinkly sounds, and pull-along fun.
  • QUALITY MATERIALS FOR QUALITY TIME: Our sensory toys for tollers babies & kids are made with prime quality materials and conforms to the ASTM in order to be durable and safe-to-use for your children. Our tissue box toy is here to stay. Page Break

Here’s How You Can Help Your Kids Development In A Fun Way!

Help your children develop fine motor skills from an early age. If you are worried that your kids might get easily bored of conventional baby toys that have nothing to offer to their mental development, then our set of play scarves for toddlers is exactly what you need to introduce them to a whole new world of different textures and fun.

Presenting the Ultimate Pull-Along Sensory Tissue Box by Young Hands!

The Young Hands preschool sensory activity is here to change your and your children’s life. Our Montessori activity is an “easy pull for easy fun” toy with jiggling scarves and crinkle tissues that will stimulate your kids’ imagination. The tissue box, equipped with a weighted bottom base for support, is extra soft and promotes baby learning and color sorting in the most entertaining way.

Pull, Laugh, Learn, REPEAT!

Kids love exploring the world and figuring out how everything around them works, from their toys to the TV’s remote control or your cell phone. Offer them the ideal sensory toy with endless options and opportunities to discover a tone of different new objects and textures and shapes. Join them and laugh along with them as they realize that pulling games are extremely entertaining and fun.
