Description:
• All-inclusive Resin Starter Kit: Our all-inclusive jewelry making kit is perfect for starting fresh. No experience is needed!  Every tool or equipment to complete all projects is conveniently included in our art resin kit.  
  • Create One-of-a-kind Crafts: With the Craft It Up epoxy resin kit, you can get inspired and let your creativity guide you to create one-of-a-kind resin art crafts to have and be truly proud of. 
  •  Everything You Need Is Here You can use the dried flowers, colorful feathers, different molds, and all other supplies provided to create unique crystal-clear epoxy glitter crafts. 
  • Discover A Stunning Gift Idea: Surprise your loved ones with an original gift.     They’ll definitely love our resin casting kit. You could also gift your ready-made molds. Friends and family will surely love to receive this unique and homemade present. 
  •  Safe For Anyone To Use: Our epoxy jewelry kit consists of home safe ingredients so that you won't compromise your health. Follow the instructions, and our jewelry resin kit can be safely used. 

Here’s How You Can Create Your Own Masterpieces & Explore Your Creative Side! 

If you are looking for a creative activity to help you unwind, then look no further ,Discover your artistic side and create beautiful gifts for friends or family. The Craft It Up resin art kit is here to change your life. 

This resin starter kit is also great for kids who are ready to tap into their creative potential. Help them create fun and lasting art. We give you countless options to choose from, between different molds, numerous decorations and fun colors. You can create completely different resin pieces every time. 

Introducing the Ultimate Resin Starter Kit with Molds By Craft It Up! 

The Craft It Up all-inclusive resin kit is made with materials of the highest quality and is home safe We worry about quality, so you don’t have to. Our epoxy resin molds kit will give you the chance to create wonderful and unique resin pieces for you and your friends and family without any previous training or special knowledge needed. 

Fun Activity For The Whole Family: 

The Craft It Up epoxy jewelry making kit is an exciting activity for the whole family to enjoy.  

Spend quality time with your loved ones and make rainy days or lazy Sunday afternoons more fun than ever! Sit around a table and let your imagination guide you in creating unique keychains, necklaces or coasters that will dazzle everyone!  

Just remember, if your kids want to add their personal touch to your creations, adult supervision is required.

Name: SAND ART
LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• CREATE STUNNING SAND ART – All-in-One Super Sand Art Activity Set Lets Your Child Create Incredible DIY Rainbow Sand Masterpieces at Home, School & More
  • EVERY ACCESSORY INCLUDED – Little Artists Are Ready to Play w/ [10] Empty Sand Bottles, [9] Brightly Colored Sand Bags, [1] Glitter Sand Bag & [1] No-Mess Funnel
  • UNLEASH YOUR CHILD’S CREATIVITY – STEM Toy Helps Your Toddler Develop Important Life Skills & Sparks Imagination for Hours of Hands-On Educational Play
  • AMAZING GIFT IDEA – Give a Unique Gift for a Son, Daughter, Nephew, Niece, Granddaughter or Grandson; Perfect Present for Holiday, Xmas or Birthday Party
  • 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – If You & Your Toddler Are Not Completely Thrilled w/ This Cool Colored Sand Art Kit, Enjoy a Full Refund, No Questions Asked!

Life’s a breeze with this sensational sand art kit!

When was the last time your little ones put down the iPad and created something amazing all on their own? Do you ever wish you could spend more quality time together, all while enjoying a fun, exciting, hands-on activity? If you’re looking for the ultimate toy to teach them creativity and provide hours of family entertainment, look no further!

Never settle for a mindless video game or cheaply made activity set again! With the Super Sand Art Children’s Kit from Creative Kids, you can enjoy high quality supplies sure to keep them occupied for days. Boys and girls tap into their imaginative sides while having fun and learning important developmental skills in the process.

And the best part? You don’t have to spend a small fortune on different accessories and tools. Everything your little artist might need is included in our all-in-one set. From empty plastic sand bottles and a no-mess funnel to countless bags of colorful and glittery sand, the sky’s the limit! So add a Sand Art Kit, and see their seaside masterpieces come to life!

Save time in a bottle!

Nowadays, children waste hours in front of the TV or tablet watching silly shows and playing mindless video games. But savvy parents remember those incredible “old-school” activities filled with wonder and excitement.

If only there was a way kids could unleash their imaginations, explore a hands-on hobby, and create one-of-a-kind mementos they can cherish forever. Sound sand-sational? Finally, they can!

STEM that’s ‘shore’ to please

You don’t need high-tech toys to engage children’s physical, mental, and emotional development. Our Sand Art Activity Set for kids is designed in collaboration with professional artists and early childhood development experts, ensuring that your boys and girls acquire key skills in a way that’s both fun and stimulating. Encourage their fine motor function, hand-eye coordination, visual analysis skills, communication and social skills, problem solving, concentration, vocabulary, and other abilities necessary for healthy development.

Name: Science to The Max Egg-Cellent Experiment - 6 Pack Science Experiments for Children-Case Pack 8
Description:
• Big Experiments for Little Scientists, 6 egg-shaped science kits are included for endless knowledge and fun. Follow along to create over 12 experiments that are easy to do and sensory based.
  • Hatch an Egg-citing Experiment, each science kit comes in a unique egg shape that will pique kids' interest and excite them for experimenting. Crack open each ‘egg’ to reveal different activities within each one.
  • Over 12 Activities for Endless Fun Each of the 6 eggs holds 2 experiments that will keep kids busy for hours. Some even have a bonus activity! All you need to conduct your experiments are included in our all-inclusive kit.
  • Easter Egg Hunt: keep kids away from candy and chocolate on their Easter egg hunt by providing something educational and entertaining. They also made a great stocking stuffer for Christmas!

Educate, Entertain and Enlighten Kids About the Wonders of Science

Science to the Max brings you an innovative way to introduce kids to the wonders around them. Science can be overwhelming, so we’ve created the perfect way to ease kids into it. Crack open each egg individually to unveil different activities in each kit. 2 experiments are included in every egg but some even have a bonus activity!

Hear the ooohs and aahs as kids discover how fun and entertaining science can be. They'll learn about polymers and different areas of chemistry as they create faux snow, crystals, water gel and so much more! Follow along the instructions that are provided in each egg to learn the science behind each of the experiments. This kit will educate as much as it will entertain!

Name: Sensory Pull Along Baby Tissue Box - Montessori Toy for Babies and Toddlers Tissue Box Learning Toys for 5 Months + STEM Educational Toys for Toddler Infant Babies (Large)
ProductFamilyName: Sensory Pull Along Toddler Infant Baby Tissue Box - Colorful Montessori Toy for Babies and Toddlers Tissue Box Toy Learning Toy for 5 Months and up for Kids - STEM Educational Preschool Toys

Name: Sensory Pull Along Toddler Infant Baby Tissue Box
Description:
• FULLY EQUIPPED SENSORY TOY TODDLER ACTIVITY PLUSH BOX - The Young Hands preschool learning tissue box with sensory scarves includes everything you need to promote the development of fine motor skills for your children. We’ve added a light weighted bottom to the box, so it doesn’t get easily pulled along and helps for effective play.
  • PROMOTE STEM EDUCATION - This sensory play rainbow scarf set is designed to engage young children and toddlers in a fun and exciting way that may help them develop their problem-solving ability & color sorting while having fun.
  • YOUR KIDS WILL DISCOVER DIFFERENT TEXTURES - Our sensory toys for babies and toddlers comes with many textures to trigger your kids' senses. Crinkled tissues, a uniquely fun designed plush tissue box, and many more are included.
  • A COLORFUL ALTERNATIVE - Babies love playing with tissue boxes and paper, so we’ve created a safe and fun replacement. This sensory tissue box will entertain babies for hours with its vibrant colors, crinkly sounds, and pull-along fun.
  • QUALITY MATERIALS FOR QUALITY TIME: Our sensory toys for tollers babies & kids are made with prime quality materials and conforms to the ASTM in order to be durable and safe-to-use for your children. Our tissue box toy is here to stay. Page Break

Here’s How You Can Help Your Kids Development In A Fun Way!

Help your children develop fine motor skills from an early age. If you are worried that your kids might get easily bored of conventional baby toys that have nothing to offer to their mental development, then our set of play scarves for toddlers is exactly what you need to introduce them to a whole new world of different textures and fun.

Presenting the Ultimate Pull-Along Sensory Tissue Box by Young Hands!

The Young Hands preschool sensory activity is here to change your and your children’s life. Our Montessori activity is an “easy pull for easy fun” toy with jiggling scarves and crinkle tissues that will stimulate your kids’ imagination. The tissue box, equipped with a weighted bottom base for support, is extra soft and promotes baby learning and color sorting in the most entertaining way.

Pull, Laugh, Learn, REPEAT!

Kids love exploring the world and figuring out how everything around them works, from their toys to the TV’s remote control or your cell phone. Offer them the ideal sensory toy with endless options and opportunities to discover a tone of different new objects and textures and shapes. Join them and laugh along with them as they realize that pulling games are extremely entertaining and fun.

Name: Sequin Surprise Unicorn Pillow for Girls
LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• BRUSH UP FOR A MAGICAL RAINBOW: Looking For A Beautiful Sequin Throw Pillow For Your Daughter's Bedroom? Presenting The B Me 2-Sided Unicorn Sequin Pillow For Girls, Which Will Reveal A Glittery Rainbow Every Time Your Brush Up With Your Hands!
  • BRUSH DOWN FOR A FAIRYTALE UNICORN: There's Not A Pot Of Gold At The End Of Our Sparkly Rainbow Flip Pillow, But There's A Stunning Fairytale Unicorn If You Brush Down With Your Hand! Meet Your Magical Friend And Surprise Your Friends Today!
  •  UNLEASH YOUR DOODLING SKILLS: Flip Over Your Unicorn Sequin Pillow And You Will Discover A Whole New World Of Creative Fun! Use The Included 8 Fabric Markers To Bring Your Imagination Into Life And Doodle For Hours On End On The Back Side!
  • 3 GIFTS FOR THE PRICE OF JUST 1: Spoil Your Daughter, Niece, Granddaughter Or Younger Sister With The B Me Sequin Pillow For Girls, Which Can Be Used As A Bedroom Throw Pillow, As A Double-Sided Sequin Pillow And As A Doodle Pillow For Girls!
  • B CREATIVE, B UNIQUE, B ME: Our Unicorn Rainbow Pillow Is Specially Designed With Creative Little Artists In Mind. If Your Little Girl Loves Doodling On Her Homework, Loves Snapping Creative Insta-Pics And Loves Fairytales, This Is Your Pillow!

IT’S A RAINBOW! IT’S A UNICORN! IT’S A DOODLE PILLOW!

IT’S THE B ME DOUBLE-SIDED SEQUIN DOODLE PILLOW FOR ENDLESS HOURS OF FUN!

It’s time to leave boring throw pillows behind you once and for all.

As soon as your little girl holds our eye-popping sequin pillow in her hands… game over!

She will never love another pillow again! The 2 head-turning designs (rainbow and unicorn) combined with the ultra-fun doodle back side will not only ruin all other pillows for her, but they will also offer her a super-fun and creative activity!

KISS YOUR BORING PILLOWS GOODBYE!

At first glance, this looks just like another sequin pillow – just like millions of other sequin pillows out there. But once your little artist flips it over, she will be able to discover our creative twist!

The back side features gorgeous unicorns, rainbows, cupcakes, diamonds, ice-creams, cakes and beautiful stars for your girl to doodle!

IMPRESS ALL YOUR FRIENDS WITH YOUR GLITTERY PILLLOW – STARTING TODAY!

FOLLOW THE EDUCATIONAL RAINBOW!

Discover a whole new world of educational fun with our 2-sided sequined pillow for girls. Make sure your preschooler spends less time playing video games or watching TV and more time developing her imagination and creativity!

Let the glittering unicorn and twinkling rainbow lead your daughter to a more fun, creative and magical world, where she will be able to develop essential skills (communication skills, fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination and social skills) while having fun!

RIDE YOUR DREAMLIKE UNICORN & LET’S GO!

Name: Snow Paper Snowy Nativity Scene Set with Paper Sheets Turn to Snow
LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• Birth of a Creative Craft: set up a snowy nativity scene with Snow Paper that turns to fluffy snow
  • Free of Mess, Full of Creativity: kit comes with punch out cards & premade holes for easy creations
  • Let it Snow! You can make 1 scene with characters & snowy backgrounds that add a magical touch
  • School or Home Showcase: this Christmas showcase makes a great party decor or school project background

Ring in the Christmas Cheer

Add the beauty of the Christmas season to your home, school or office. Create a beautiful snowy nativity scene using the included paper sheets and Snow Paper. You get 2 papercraft sheets & 3 Snow Paper sheets to create a magical Christmas scene with characters, sheep, camel & more.

Use the included pipette to add a drop of water to the Snow Paper. Watch as the seemingly ordinary paper erupts to create fluffy hills of snow. Make Christmas time a lot more exciting with a DIY craft that you’ll be proud to display.

Description:
• Let it Snow! Ring in the magic of winter with Snow Paper that turns to snow with a drop of water
  • Create Winter Decorations: make ornaments & more with Snow Paper that could be cut to any shape or size
  • What You Get: 3 Snow Paper to add a snowy element to any project, & pipette to add water
  • Add White Ornaments to Your Party: cut your Snow Paper into snowflakes to bedazzle your space
  • Safe & Fun to Use: this product is non-toxic, safe & intended for ages 14+ who enjoy getting creative

A Touch of Winter, Anytime

Add the beauty of winter white seasons to your home or projects. You get 3 sheets of Snow Paper to complete your winter wonderland vision. The sheets are made of a snow polymer that erupts before your eyes! No stirring required.

Add water with the pipette & watch it erupt to snow within seconds. There’s no need to wait for winter to enjoy slushy, messy snow. Now, you can appreciate a life-like alternative all year round!

Cut your Snow Paper sheets into shapes & letters to decorate your space. Enhance your ornaments, Christmas cards, invitations, school projects, walls etc.

Use the included pipette to add a drop of water to the Snow Paper. Watch as the seemingly ordinary paper erupts into a layer of fluffy white snow. Make Christmas time more exciting with a DIY craft you’ll be proud to display.

Description:

  • GIVE A GLAMOROUS GIFT - This An Exceptional Way To Stimulate Creativity In Children, Tweens, And Young Teens. Looking For A Cool Gift? This Kit Is Perfect.
  • NO HAMMER, NO HASSLE - Everything Needed To Create A String Art Set Is Included– No Need To Shop For Any Supplies Or Special Tools. This Set Provides Pushpins, Instead Of Nails That Need To Be Hammered In, That Makes It Great For Beginners.

Transform String And Pins Into Art!

Start with string, pins, paper, and aboard and end with adorable art.

Discover a whole new world of string art, from colorful rainbows to fashionable flowers. Learn just three techniques - Scribble, Fan, and Zigzag - to make 4 distinctive and beautiful art pieces. Use whatever background paper and string colors you like to give your string art a style that's all your own.

A Little Yarn Can Go A Long Way

This DIY room décor string art kit is perfect for encouraging your kids to use their imagination and creativity and decorate their rooms at the same time.

If you’re looking for something that makes the most perfect gift for your kids for any occasion, then you’re looking at the right kit. This string art kit can keep kids engaged for hours. They’ll be proud of the beautiful pieces of art created by them, which they can use to decorate their room or cherish as a keepsake.

Kids will learn different techniques and get unique ideas on how to create their own style board. They will start with foam board, backgrounds, and then use their own designs to decorate using stickers, flowers, threads, sequins, etc.

Great Decorations For Your Kid’s Rooms Created By Them

It’s the perfect way to encourage your kids to decorate their room with these fun foam boards and all the decorations that come with them.

Small Craft To Encourage Big Creations

This kit provides the tools but your kid’s imagination and style let them decorate these fun boards. These make great gifts for kids 6+ to keep them engaged indoors for hours.

Save time in a bottle!

Nowadays, children waste hours in front of the TV or tablet watching silly shows and playing mindless video games. But savvy parents remember those incredible “old-school” activities filled with wonder and excitement.

If only there was a way kids could unleash their imaginations, explore a hands-on hobby, and create one-of-a-kind mementos they can cherish forever. Sound sand-sational? Finally, they can!

STEM that’s ‘shore’ to please

You don’t need high-tech toys to engage children’s physical, mental, and emotional development. Our Sand Art Activity Set for kids is designed in collaboration with professional artists and early childhood development experts, ensuring that your boys and girls acquire key skills in a way that’s both fun and stimulating. Encourage their fine motor function, hand-eye coordination, visual analysis skills, communication and social skills, problem solving, concentration, vocabulary, and other abilities necessary for healthy development.

Name: SUPER SQUISHY SCIENCE LAB
LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• THE PERFECT STARTER PACK FOR LITTLE SCIENTISTS: The all-inclusive slime set will provide your kids with everything they might need to start making oozing, gooey, and sandy amazing creations.
  • STEM EDUCATION AT ITS FINEST: Encourage young scientists to examine the principles of science on their own by creating stretchy putty, a bouncing putty, and many more with our slime kit for boys.
  • MORE THAN 20 EXPERIMENTS INCLUDED: The Be Amazing! Toys slime kit for kids comes with many real tools and ingredients like mixing sticks, molds, and many more for kids to conduct their experiments.
  • OFFER AN EDUCATIONAL GIFT: Our fluffy slime kit is the ideal birthday, thanksgiving, or Christmas gift for children. Make a gift that oozes fun and stretches their knowledge to a whole new level.
  • EXPERIMENT IN ABSOLUTE SAFETY: With your children's safety always in mind, we have created a putty slime making kit with prime, kid-safe materials. Let them explore and experiment without worrying.

Here’s How You Can Ignite the Curiosity of Young Scientists

If your kids get easily bored of conventional games and if you are looking for a way to keep them busy and away from tablets, computers or TV screens, then we have got the perfect activity to entertain your children and help them learn many scientific facts in the process.

Introducing the Ultimate STEM Science Lab by Be Amazing! Toys!

The Be Amazing! Toys putty slime science lab for kids is a fun and educational activity for boys and girls. Give your kids the chance to explore and discover the world of polymers. Help them observe the differences between oozing, stretching, and molding through a variety of over 20 experiments, and watch them as they are having a blast in the process.

Name: SUPER SQUISHY STUDIO
LastSuppliedBy: DAVID Suzhou Creative Kids Co., Ltd
Description:
• Customize Your Very Own Squishies: The Creative Kids squishy toys making kit will give you the chance to paint and decorate 3 large squishies and 2 keychain squishies. Paint, decorate, sprinkle, and squish away. 
  • Extra Large, Extra Squishy: Our unique squishy kit was created with a slo-mo formula that provides extra squishiness. In addition, the 3 large squishies are quite Jumbo! There’s lots to squeeze. 
  • ‘Shake’ It Up With This ‘Cool’ Kit: Our all-inclusive kit comes with 2 ice cream and 1 milkshake squishies to paint and decorate. As a bonus, you get 2 mini squishies on keychains to carry around wherever you go! Use the artificial topping to make your creations pop. 
  • Squeezable Squishies To Share: There’s enough material provided for you and your friends to paint together. You get 3 paintbrushes and 5 squishies so you can share the fun! Your BFFs will love their new squeezable friend. 
  • Kid-safe Non-toxic Materials: The Creative Kids DIY squishies creation kit uses prime materials to meet the highest standards and be completely safe to use.

More Squish in Your Squeeze 

The Creative Kids Super Squishy Studio kit is a great way to keep kids entertained while providing a creative outlet that will challenge their imagination. They’ll be able to create multiple ice cream themed squishies using paint, puff paint and sprinkles. Kids will surely be proud of their cool creations. 

Our jumbo squishies are fun, relaxing and satisfying to squeeze. They’re super soft and can be decorated in multiple vivid paint colors. Use the 2 toppings to add that special touch to your ice creams, milkshake, croissant or donut. You even get a color guide so you can mix your paints and get even more paint options. Paint, decorate and squeeze your very own custom squishy. 

It’s All Fun & Games For The Whole Family!  

The Creative Kids squishies kit is the perfect project to promote family time while being remarkably fun. The perfect activity for drizzly days or parties, our squishy toys offer countless hours of fun and games for the whole family to enjoy.

  • Kid-safe Non-toxic Materials: The Creative Kids DIY squishies creation kit uses prime materials to meet the highest standards and be completely safe to use.

More Squish in Your Squeeze 

The Creative Kids Super Squishy Studio kit is a great way to keep kids entertained while providing a creative outlet that will challenge their imagination. They’ll be able to create multiple ice cream themed squishies using paint, puff paint and sprinkles. Kids will surely be proud of their cool creations. 

Our jumbo squishies are fun, relaxing and satisfying to squeeze. They’re super soft and can be decorated in multiple vivid paint colors. Use the 2 toppings to add that special touch to your ice creams, milkshake, croissant or donut. You even get a color guide so you can mix your paints and get even more paint options. Paint, decorate and squeeze your very own custom squishy. 

It’s All Fun & Games For The Whole Family!  

The Creative Kids squishies kit is the perfect project to promote family time while being remarkably fun. The perfect activity for drizzly days or parties, our squishy toys offer countless hours of fun and games for the whole family to enjoy.

Name: Ultimate Crochet Creations For Kids
Description:
• GET CREATIVE AND LEARN HOW TO CROCHET with this fantastic crochet kit for beginners that includes everything you need to weave with confidence. Create your signature style by making rainbow keychains, unicorns, headbands, and pom-poms.
  •  EXPLORE THE LIMITS OF YOUR CREATIVITY: Our kids’ knitting kit for beginners will help you master the single, double, and slip crochet stitch, create your unicorn purse and decorate it with vibrant flowers or pom poms.
  • START KNITTING RIGHT AWAY: This set of yarn crafts for kids includes an illustrated instruction guides for easy use. Unlike many knitting looms for kids, our crochet hooks knit kit is specially designed for beginners.
  • BOOST YOUR PROBLEM-SOLVING SKILLS: These educational kids’ knitting kits for beginners will improve your comprehension, math, critical thinking abilities, and improve your fine motor coordination, the fun way.
  • YOUR SATISFACTION IS GUARANTEED. We’re confident you’ll love this product. If you don’t, you’ll get your money back! Make sure to share the fun with friends for the full experience. Packaging may vary.

WATCH STEP BY STEP VIDEO

Fun, Creative, And Engaging: The Perfect Crochet Beginner’s Kit Is Here!

Keeping kids happy at home is no mean feat. They get easily bored and the nagging starts. A creative art and crafts kit seems to be the only way to catch their attention It gets children involved in creative activity and makes time fly on a rainy day. Our crochet kit for kids is exactly what you’re looking for.

Introducing The B Me Ultimate Crochet Creation Kit For Kids Ages 8+!

We all have to start out somewhere, and when it comes to crochet, a beginner crochet kit might be the perfect starting point.

Our kids’ crochet kits are ideal for beginners. It has everything your child needs to complete a crochet project. You don’t need to have a large crochet inventory at home or worry about buying the wrong yarn or the wrong size needle. Everything your children need is ready for them in the kit!

This project is also the perfect party entertainment. Invite some friends over for some ultimate fun! Parties and sleepovers just got a little better!

Take Pride In Your Kids’ Rainbow Crochet Projects!

This beginner crochet kit for kids will teach them how to crochet and allow them to experiment with colorful yarn, hooks, and needle. They’ll make vibrant pom-poms keychains, hair ties, headbands, and crochet flowers for their unicorn purse. Children will get the essential crocheting skills and learn how to make single stitches, double stitches, and slip knots.

Don’t Leave Home Without Your Crochet Kit!

The handy storage bag in the crochet set will keep all your crochet supplies in one place. You’ll easily find what you’re looking for at any time. The stringbox will store and carry the DIY crochet kit to any playdate, weekend trip, or holiday getaway.

  • Big Entertainment for Little Fashionistas! This DIY fashion kit comes with simple instructions for easy use. It’s a perfect entertainment addition to any birthday party, play date or sleepover. 
  • An Unforgettable Gift for Any Special Occasion: surprise a loved one with this unique gift that will keep them creatively occupied for hours. 
  • Everything’s Included! All you need to get started is included in this kit. The toxic-free and high-quality supplies will make for long lasting accessories.  

Starter Kit for Future Fashion Icons 

Kids love making their own accessories. They can work alone or together with their friends to create shiny hairpieces and glittery accessories. They will style personalized headbands in a variety of designs. Our headband making set for kids includes all you need to create 16 rainbow hairpieces made to wear, share and enjoy! 

Included in the box is 60+ craft pieces that are easy to use in little hands, as well as simple, colorful instructions that will help young crafters create headbands with confidence. 

Share the Creativity  

Encourage social skills by having friends join in on the fun! There are enough supplies for a few of your BFFs to try their hand at hair fashion design too. 

Combine rainbow fabric flowers, unicorn horns, rhinestones, vibrant pom-poms and ribbons to make boutique-style headbands that match your outfits. This creative kids’ craft set gives children the chance to learn, pretend and explore their artistic talent, enhance their motor skills, color recognition and hand-eye coordination.

Name: Ultimate Rock Painting Craft Kit for Kids
Description:
• A CHILDREN’S ART KIT THAT ROCKS! – Premium Rock Decorating Activity Kit Offers Hours of Painting & Creative Fun; Perfect for Home, School, Kids Parties & Beyond
  • ALL ACCESSORIES INCLUDED – Extensive Set Includes [10] White, Glossy River Stones, [2] Brushes, [12] Vibrant Color Paints, [2] Transfer Sheets & [8] Googly Eyes
  • EDUCATIONAL LEARNING – Playset Helps Develop Essential Social & Physical Skills Such as Fine Motor Function, Hand-Eye Coordination & Creative Problem Solving
  • SENSATIONAL GIFT IDEA – Entertain Your Son, Daughter, Nephew, Niece or Grandchild for Hours; Makes a Unique Present for Christmas, Holiday or Birthday
  • 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – If You & Your Toddler Are Not Completely Thrilled w/ This Cool River Rock Paint Set, Enjoy a Full Refund, No Questions Asked!

Let creativity rock and roll with this awesome rock art set!

Did you know that painting can be one of the most rewarding and beneficial activities for a child? Arts and crafts experiences not only spark preschoolers’ creativity and imaginative thinking, but they also offer a hands-on alternative to today’s addictive video games and mind-numbing iPad videos. Do you wish you could give them a little bit of that old-school fun, excitement and learning?

Finally, you can help your child channel their inner artist with this Ultimate Rock Decorating Activity Set by Creative Kids! Our all-inclusive rock art set allows your little one to discover his or her talents and create adorable painted rocks without any artistic ability required. Gather the entire family around the table, set up your DIY decorating station, and enjoy hours of quality time together.

And the best part? Our rock painting kit for children contains EVERY SINGLE TOOL & ACCESSORY your little artist needs to get started. From glossy river rocks and design transfer sheets to acrylic paints and brushes, everything is here to help them create an incredible masterpiece. So set the electronic devices aside, and pick up a Creative Kids Rock Painting Set to get the educational party started!

Parents: It’s Time To Rock The Playtime Boat!
